title: ReproHash: A Verification Primitive for Computational Input Integrity
description: ReproHash provides cryptographic verification of computational input integrity without re-execution. This repository contains the complete source code, test cases, and examples used in the manuscript 'ReproHash: A Verification Primitive for Computational Input Integrity'.
references: Baker, M. (2016). 1,500 scientists lift the lid on reproducibility. Nature, 533(7604), 452-454.
Stodden, V., et al. (2016). Enhancing reproducibility for computational methods. Science, 354(6317), 1240-1241.
